definition: relating to or having eloquence, shrewdness, swiftness, thievishness characteristics, attributed to the god Mercury
details:
adjective
- relating to or having eloquence, shrewdness, swiftness, thievishness characteristics, attributed to the god Mercury
= example: relating to or having eloquence, shrewdness, swiftness, thievishness characteristics, attributed to the god Mercury
- relating to or under the (astrological) influence of the planet Mercury
= example: relating to or under the (astrological) influence of the planet Mercury
